name: 2K Essentials Collection
summary: The 2K Essentials Collection features the groundbreaking originals Bioshock and Borderlands as well as the highly acclaimed XCOM: Enemy Unknown. A must have collection for any game library.

name: 2K48
summary:
2048 is an addictive and challenging number puzzle game that will test your strategic skills and mental agility. The game is played on a 4x4 grid, and the objective is to combine tiles with the same numbers to create a tile with the number 2048.

To play the game, you need to slide the tiles in any direction using your fingers or the arrow keys. Whenever two tiles with the same number touch, they merge into one, creating a new tile with a higher number. The game starts with two tiles of the number 2, and you need to combine them to get the number 4. From there, you need to keep combining tiles to get higher numbers and reach the target of 2048.

name: 2K Ball N' Brawl Bundle
summary: Become a legend on the court and in the ring with two action-packed arcade games in the 2K Ball N' Brawl Bundle! Brawl as your favorite WWE Superstars & Legends using over-the-top moves in WWE 2K Battlegrounds Deluxe Edition. Then take street ball to the next level in NBA 2K Playgrounds 2, with a master roster of current & retired NBA players. Ball and brawl without limits at a reduced price today!

name: 2Kxx
summary: 2KXX is a local multiplayer game. Fight your friends on a selection of various characters, maps, and game modes. Spice your Match with a list of modifiers that can make your life easier or worse.

name: 2K Drive
summary:
Buckle-up and get ready for the most immersive automotive experience to ever hit your iPad and iPhone. 
 
2K Drive provides you with a variety of experiences to test your driving skills – including licensed cars, real locations and dozens of exciting challenges in an authentic world rooted in motoring culture. Expert driving will earn you stars and coins to purchase boosts, upgrades, new cars and more! 
 
2K Drive lets you compete online with your friends and the world, to earn the best scores, bragging rights, and rewards ahead of your rivals. Live news feeds deliver the world of automotive culture right to you, so when you’re not driving, you can read, watch videos or view photo galleries – and if you see something you really like, share it with friends. With daily challenges, more cars, tracks, and news added regularly, 2K Drive offers more content than any other driving game on your iPad or iPhone. Don’t dream it, drive it!

name: 2K Games Pack
summary:
2K Games Pack is a collection of six games and programs. The collection consists of:

Snail: You have $50 and the choice to bet an amount of money on one of four snails to reach the other side of the screen first.

Advice: A program which gives you a statement to take as advice.

Dice: You and the computer take it in turns to throw a dice and the winner is the one with the highest score after 10 throws.

31: The computer gives you a number and you decide whether to receive another one with the aim to get closer to 31 than the computer.

Sketch: A program allowing you to draw pictures and shapes with a cursor.

Reverse: A puzzle game where you have to put 10 mixed up numbers in order by selecting how many numbers from the left will be reversed.

name: 2K20 Cuba
summary: 2K20 Cuba is a modification of the 2012 MLB 2K game. Featuring all the teams that participate in the National Series of Cuban baseball and their respective updated rosters and stadiums.

name: 2K Shells
summary: A Kaizo dedicated to everyone who supported me on my journey so far, have fun was made with lots of love and affection for this incredible community.

name: 2K Invaders
summary:
Resist the waves of aliens. Protect from their lasers behind your bunkers which are gradually crumbling...

Created for the 2001 mini game competition by Richard Wilson.
